Interface IWebSocket

Encapsulate logic required for communicating with web socket server from API.

Inherited Members
System.IDisposable.Dispose()
Namespace: Alpaca.Markets
Assembly: Alpaca.Markets.dll
Syntax
public interface IWebSocket : IDisposable

Methods

CloseAsync(CancellationToken)

Closes web socket communication channel. Connection state changes will be reported using Closed event and errors - using Error event.

Declaration
Task CloseAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken

A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Connection closing task for awaiting (if needed).

OpenAsync(CancellationToken)

Opens web socket communication channel. Connection state changes will be reported using Opened event and errors - using Error event.

Declaration
Task OpenAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken

A cancellation token that can be used by other objects or threads to receive notice of cancellation.
Returns
Type Description
System.Threading.Tasks.Task

Connection opening task for awaiting (if needed).

Send(String)

Sends text message into opened web socket connection.

Declaration
void Send(string message)
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.String message

Events

Closed

Occurred after successful web socket disconnection (at protocol level).

Declaration
event Action Closed
Event Type
Type Description
System.Action

DataReceived

Occurred on each new completed web socket message receiving data or text.

Declaration
event Action<byte[]> DataReceived
Event Type
Type Description
System.Action<System.Byte[]>

Error

Occurred in case of any communication errors (on opening/close/listening/send).

Declaration
event Action<Exception> Error
Event Type
Type Description
System.Action<System.Exception>

MessageReceived

Occurred on each new completed web socket message receiving text.

Declaration
event Action<string> MessageReceived
Event Type
Type Description
System.Action<System.String>

Opened

Occurred after successful web socket connection (at protocol level).

Declaration
event Action Opened
Event Type
Type Description
